com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.args

Class LongArgs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.args.LongArgs

  • @FullyTested
public final class LongArgs
extends Object
    Static methods to check long arguments.

    See ObjectArgs for an overview.

    Author:
    Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)

        @FullyTested
public static long checkPositive(long value,
                             String argName)
        Tests if value > 0
        Parameters:
        value - a value to test
        argName - argument name for value, e.g., "strListSize" or "searchRegexLength"
        Returns:
        the validated value
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if value of value <= 0
        See Also:
        checkNotPositive(long, String), checkNegative(long, String), checkNotNegative(long, String)
